title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.4 - Moving domestic animals which have been fed garbage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 52.4 - Moving domestic animals which have been fed garbage

State Regulations

No domestic animals, including poultry, which have been fed
any garbage since the first day of July, 1975 in violation of section
72-a
of the Agriculture and Markets Law
shall be removed from the premises where fed except for the purpose of
immediate slaughter and, then, only by prior written permission of the

Commissioner of Agriculture and Markets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
52.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
